name: Type.Color()
description:
A small project made for MiniJam 62:Colors.

Had a lot of fun while making this.

Please let me know if you liked it.

Thank you for playing! :)

NOTE: I have this weird bug of not showing the highscore in webgl. I searched the internet and found that im using http address while this website is hosted on https server. I'm extremely sorry for the inconvenience as i cannot re-write the code due to lack of time. So I must remove the highscore system in the webgl game :(. however it is included in the standalone application :).

BUT THIS WORKS FINE WITH THE STANDALONE GAME. I'VE INCLUDED THE FILE TOO YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THE FILE.

Thank you.
